title: Kwong Wing Yan
text:
Kwong Wing Yan (born 25 July 1984) is a Hongkonger <a href="Women%27s%20association%20football">footballer</a> who plays as a <a href="forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a>. She is also a <a href="futsal">futsal</a> player, and represented Hong Kong internationally in both <a href="Hong%20Kong%20women%27s%20national%20football%20team">football</a> and <a href="Hong%20Kong%20women%27s%20national%20futsal%20team">futsal</a>.
International career.
Kwong Wing Yan has been capped for Hong Kong at senior level in both <a href="Association%20football">football</a> and <a href="futsal">futsal</a>. In football, she represented <a href="Hong%20Kong%20women%27s%20national%20football%20team">Hong Kong</a> at four <a href="AFC%20Women%27s%20Asian%20Cup%20qualification">AFC Women's Asian Cup qualification</a> editions (<a href="2008%20AFC%20Women%27s%20Asian%20Cup%20qualification">2008</a>, <a href="2010%20AFC%20Women%27s%20Asian%20Cup%20qualification">2010</a>, <a href="2014%20AFC%20Women%27s%20Asian%20Cup%20qualification">2014</a> and <a href="2018%20AFC%20Women%27s%20Asian%20Cup%20qualification">2018</a>), two <a href="AFC%20Women%27s%20Olympic%20Qualifying%20Tournament">AFC Women's Olympic Qualifying Tournament</a> editions (<a href="Football%20at%20the%202012%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Women%27s%20Asian%20Qualifiers">2012</a> and <a href="2020%20AFC%20Women%27s%20Olympic%20Qualifying%20Tournament">2020</a>) and two <a href="EAFF%20E-1%20Football%20Championship%20%28women%29">EAFF E-1 Football Championship</a> editions (<a href="2017%20EAFF%20E-1%20Football%20Championship%20%28women%29">2017</a> and <a href="2019%20EAFF%20E-1%20Football%20Championship%20%28women%29">2019</a>).
In futsal, Kwong Wing Yan played for <a href="Hong%20Kong%20women%27s%20national%20futsal%20team">Hong Kong</a> at two <a href="AFC%20Women%27s%20Futsal%20Championship">AFC Women's Futsal Championship</a> editions (<a href="2015%20AFC%20Women%27s%20Futsal%20Championship">2015</a> and <a href="2018%20AFC%20Women%27s%20Futsal%20Championship">2018</a>).
